content: brown yarn chain 1 increase in each of thests around the top of the previous 4 row~8 fo on the tan yarn and use it to sew the lower legonto the foot place a st marker in the last st round 5 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet~11 round 6 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet 7~13 round 7 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 9~14 round 8 single_crochet in each st around~14 round 9 single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 8~15 round 10 single_crochet in each st around~15 fo on the 1st leg butnotthe 2nd continue ontothe body the body is worked in rounds place a stitch markerafter the end of round 1 and move it up after everyrnd note the flo and blo are optional they just showtexture round 1 single_crochet 7 treble_crochet increase take the 1st leg and do a trinc in the 5th st that you worked in the last round single_crochet 9 decrease decrease in the 4th st before the st marker single_crochet 2~26 twist the longer wire around the shorter wire asshown in pic round 2 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 5 increase 4 single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 3~27 note this row does not reach the st marker cut a 10in wire this row should start on the back right if it doesnot then you may have to add or take out a few sts row 1 chain 17 starting inthe 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 14 around wire slip_stitch 2 turn~16 row 2 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 10 the last 4sts areleft unworked chain 5 turn~17 row 3 flo starting in the 2nd chain from hook sl st2 single_crochet 12 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet back into the body around the wire continue to single_crochet aroundthe wire each time you go back into the body turn~16 row 4 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 10 chain 6 turn~18 row 5 flo starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3 single_crochet 12 slip_stitch 2 turn~17 row 6 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 11 chain 6 turn~19 row 7 flo starting in the 2nd chain from hook sl st3 single_crochet 12 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet back into the body turn~18 row 8 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 12 chain 6 turn~20 row 9 flo staring in the 2nd chain from hook sl st3 single_crochet 14 slip_stitch 2 turn~19 row 10 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 13 chain 5 turn~20 row 11 flo starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 14 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet back into the body turn~18 row 12 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 12 5 sts are leftunworked chain 5 turn~19 row 13 flo starting in the 2nd chain from hook sl st2 single_crochet 14 slip_stitch 2 turn~18 row 14 chain 1 blo slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 11 chain 5 turn~18 row 15 flo starting in the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 12 around wire slip_stitch 2 around wire single_crochet 2 back into the body~18 round 3 single_crochet 6 increase single_crochet
